text: Mensa International (or just Mensa) is the largest, oldest and most famous high-IQ group of people in the world.Mensa Overview. Retrieved April 30, 2010. The non-profit organization only has members with high IQs. They must score at the 98th percentile or higher on a standardized, supervised intelligence test. In many cases the IQ you have to have to join is 130. official website (alternative URL) == Related pages == * List of Mensans * Intertel * Triple Nine Society == References == == Other websites == * Mensa Education and Research Foundation * Mensa for Kids * Example of tests similar to Mensa tests Category:Intelligence Category:Non-profit organisations of the United Kingdom
title: Mensa International
